Name: Battle Imagine - Muku Scout
Description:
Use to activate or upgrade Muku Scout's Battle Imagine skill: Stunt! Predator Slash.

Stunt! Predator Slash
Summon Elite: Muku Scout to chase the target, dealing Attack Damage.
Upon the skill cast, immediately gains full passive effects, and the stack count is doubled within 20s.
Description2$english: A crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram, possessing supernatural power. This principle has not been unraveled since the Bapharian civilization.
